report.title: Spring squares list with mapping
report.description: List of SPRING squares with country filter.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist# AND l.deleted=false AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#)) AND l.location_type_id = #square_location_type_id# #order_by#

param.name: bounds
param.description: Well known text for the bounding box to load

param.name: location_country_code_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute that holds the location's country code.

param.name: parent_country_id
param.join: JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_attribute_id = #location_country_code_attr_id# AND lav.location_id = l.id AND lav.deleted = false JOIN locations countries on countries.code = lav.text_value AND countries.location_type_id in (#country_location_type_id#) AND countries.deleted = false AND countries.id = #parent_country_id#

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of sample IDs to filter to.
